sentences.sentence: Boser has to vaccinate her foxes against various diseases.
sentences.translation: 博瑟必须给她的狐狸接种预防各种疾病的疫苗。

sentences.sentence: This inspired his team to vaccinate their kids.
sentences.translation: 这鼓舞了他的团队为他们的孩子接种疫苗。

sentences.sentence: They vaccinate our children and help us to recover when we are sick.
sentences.translation: 他们对我们的儿童进行预防接种并帮助我们在患病时康复。
